body_html:
@skye That's great! Thanks for looking this up! :)

@suharshs I was actually asking about TF_Reset, not because I have a usage scenario for it, but because I wanted to understand its semantics and when it might be useful. Regarding tensor handles, reading the documentation you referenced makes me think that, given that I share the same memory buffer when I feed/fetch tensors to sessions (as opposed to copying them), that is unnecessary. Does that sound reasonable?

body:
@skye That's great! Thanks for looking this up! :)

@suharshs I was actually asking about TF_Reset, not because I have a usage scenario for it, but because I wanted to understand its semantics and when it might be useful. Regarding tensor handles, reading the documentation you referenced makes me think that, given that I share the same memory buffer when I feed/fetch tensors to sessions (as opposed to copying them), that is unnecessary. Does that sound reasonable?
